resources.string: How did you feel at work today?

Below you can change the office you vote for

Developed by: DEK Technologies Sweden AB.

Contact: info-se@dektech.com.au

Copyright (©) 2016 DEK Technologies Sweden AB. GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE Version 3

How this was developed: At DEK Technologies we use a hardware voting panel named DailyPulse for having employees vote for how they feel on a certain day. DailyPulse is made by Celpax company reachable at http://www.celpax.com/

User Guide
You are meant to vote only once during a given day. In case you vote more than once, the app would only know that this is not your first time voting.
If not successful - In case the vote you submit via this mobile application fails to be sent, for example in case you are disconnected from Internet, your vote will be stored to be sent with the next vote that you will submit. Once your vote is submitted successfully, the app would not store the user\'s vote on the mobile, and will erase the records.

Privacy
This app does not aim to disclose your identity. As our users\' privacy is of utmost non-negotiable nature to us.
We at DEK Technologies AB Sweden have queried Celpax if they can link users\' votes with their identity later to track who has voted, who has voted happy or sad. Celpax directed us to their privacy policy on their website and stated that they do not store in any manner any information that can later on be used to link users\' identity with your activities and votes.
Celpax\'s Policy - To view the privacy policy of Celpax, visit their website at this link.
